info.name: Helpwise API Documentation
info.description:
The Helpwise provides many APIs that you can use to integrate with third party softwares and you can easily build the automation though the REST API. If you would like to add some API endpoint which can be useful or have some question regarding the Helpwise Developer APIs then you can email to [dev@helpwise.io](https://mail:dev@helpwise.io) email.

## **Getting started guide**

- You must use a valid API Key & API Secret to send requests to the API endpoints. You can get your API key from Helpwise's Settings Page \[API Key Section\] [integrations dashboard](https://app.helpwise.io/settings/api).
- The API has [rate and usage limits](https://postman.postman.co/workspace/Collection-Templates~6311738d-2e70-441f-ae12-78caf078c5b7/collection/22517504-e9c28f47-1253-44af-a2f3-20dce4da1f18?ctx=documentation#rate-and-usage-limits).
- The API only responds to HTTPS-secured communications. Any requests sent via HTTP return an HTTP 301 redirect to the corresponding HTTPS resources.
- The API returns request responses in JSON format. When an API request returns an error, it is sent in the JSON response as an error key.
    

## Authentication

`You can get your API_KEY and API_SECRET from the Helpwise settings page`

[PAGE LINK](https://app.helpwise.io/settings/api) The Helpwise API uses your `API_KEY` and `API_SECRET` for authentication.

Helpwise uses API keys for authentication. You can generate a Postman API key in the [API keys](https://app.helpwise.io/settings/api) section of your Postman account settings.

You must include an API key and API Secret in each request to the Postman API with the Basic auth header `Basic BASE_64(API_KEY:API_SECRET)`

### Authentication error response

If an API key is missing, malformed, or invalid, you will receive an HTTP 401 Unauthorized response code.

## Rate and usage limits

API access rate limits apply at a per-API key basis in unit time. The limit is 100 requests per minute. Also, depending on your plan, you may have usage limits. If you exceed either limit, your request will return an HTTP 429 Too Many Requests status code.

Each API response returns the following set of headers to help you identify your use status:

| Header | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `X-RateLimit-Limit` | The maximum number of requests that the consumer is permitted to make per minute. |
| `X-RateLimit-Remaining` | The number of requests remaining in the current rate limit window. |
| `X-RateLimit-Reset` | The time at which the current rate limit window resets in UTC epoch seconds. |

### 503 response

An HTTP `503` response from our servers indicates there is an unexpected spike in API access traffic. The server is usually operational within the next five minutes. If the outage persists or you receive any other form of an HTTP `5XX` error, [contact support](https://helpwise.io).

V0 Aut

item.name: Conversations
Action

request.description:
From this API endpoint you can close the Helpwise conversations

`ids must be integer type`

`ids array must be less then 100 length`

From this API endpoint you can move to inbox Helpwise conversations

`ids must be integer type`

`ids array must be less then 100 length`

From this API endpoint you can spam the Helpwise conversations

`ids must be integer type`

`ids array must be less then 100 length`

From this API endpoint you can trash the Helpwise conversations

`ids must be integer type`

`ids array must be less then 100 length`

From this API endpoint you can delete the Helpwise conversations

`ids must be integer type`

`ids array must be less then 100 length`

item.description: This folder has the all actions related endpoint which means you can perform the close, spam, trash, move to inbox, delete the `Helpwise conversation`

request.description:
| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS | | --- | --- | --- | | inboxIds (required) | number array | mailbox id of your inbox | | labelId | number | 14-> All
0-> Assigned
10-> Unassigned
11-> Starred
9-> Snoozed
2-> Draft
1-> Sent
7-> Closed
8-> Spam
5-> Trash
6-> Scheduled | | pageToken | string | Page token will require in second request | | limit | number | limit of conversation | You can use this endpoint, to get the all the conversation of multiple inboxes or single inbox.

item.description: All the conversations related endpoint is listed here where you can perform action( close, spam, trash, move to inbox, delete) on the conversation, get the conversations emails from conversation id and you can also get the inbox's conversations with pagination.

item.name: Send Message

request.description:
You can use this endpoint to send SMS to your customers. | PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS | | --- | --- | --- | | InboxId (required) | number | inbox id of your Helpwise
inbox | | body(required) | string | message body | | clientNumber(required) | string | your customer's number | | hash(optional) | string | you can use this hash when, you are working with parallelism which means you can make your own API identiy from this hash | | action(optional) | object {'assignTo':0,'name':'unassign'} //close, spam, trash, moveToInbox | you can use this to unassign, close, spam, trash and movetoInbox conversation along with send SMS |

response.name: Send SMS
response.body: { "status": "success", "message": "Message sent successfully!", "data": { "client_number": "14156349606", "hw_number": "17377872107", "message_time": "2024-02-07 11:50:36", "direction": "outbound", "delivery_status": "delivered", "segments": 1, "twilio_cost": null, "body": "Hello Rishabh,\nHow May I help you?", "mms_status": 0, "type": 3, "price_unit": "", "sent_by": { "id": 18233, "firstname": "Rishabh", "lastname": "Rawat", "email": "rishabh@helpwise.io", "avatarTag": "RR", "avatarUrl": "" }, "attachments": [], "randomMsgID": "", "univId": 0, "id": 2241589 } }

request.description:
You can use this endpoint to send WhatsApp message to your customers. You can get the templates from this endpoint. [Click Here](https://helpwisedev.postman.co/workspace/Helpwise~2e84d0c2-93bd-47ff-8bae-1d2280e5fab7/request/29744652-0964c927-5e4e-4f70-aaa7-e9f212484020?ctx=documentation) | PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS | | --- | --- | --- | | InboxId (required) | number | inbox id of your Helpwise
inbox | | body(required) | string | message body | | clientNumber(required) | string | your customer's number | | template(optional) | object (please check below) | templateId-> int (required),
templateVariables-> strings array(required) | | hash(optional) | string | you can use this hash when, you are working with parallelism which means you can make your own API identiy from this hash | | action(optional) | object {assignTo:0,name:"unassign"} //close, spam, trash, moveToInbox | you can use this to unassign, close, spam, trash and movetoInbox conversation along with send message | Here is the template object that you can use to send the template message from the API | **PARAMETERS** | **TYPE** | **DETAILS** | | --- | --- | --- | | templateId | number | helpwise template id | | templateVariables | string array | template variables which basically body variables | | headerVariables | string array | header variable which include image link, text and web link | | locationVariables | object | location object. eg:

{
"latitude":"78.909787",
"longitude":"55.99086",
"name":"Taj Hotel",
"address":"A-8, New York"
} |

response.name: Apply Tags on Conversations
Remove Tags on Conversations

request.description:
| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS | | --- | --- | --- | | start(required) | string | start datetime \[YYYY-MM-DD H:i:s\] | | end(required) | string | end datetime \[YYYY-MM-DD H:i:s\] | | inboxId(optional) | int | inboxId filter for the report, if not provided then all inboxIds will be considered | | TagId\[\](optional) | integer array | TagIds filter for the report | | isBusinessHours(optional) | int | working hours filter for the report, if not provided then 0 will be considered, otherwise
1 value will considered as working hour report | You can use this endpoint to get the **Overall Reports** and **Team Performance Report** of the Helpwise which includes the following data: **Overall Reports Data** - Emails per day(Inbound Emails & Outbound Emails) - Total new conversations based on date filter - Total close conversations based on date filter - Assigned conversations based on date filter - Emails on hourly basis - Busiest hour of the day - Busiest day of the week **Team Performance Data** - Average Time to Resolution - Average Response Time - Average First Response Time - Customer Satisfaction - Performance of Agents which include CSAT, Average Time to Resolution, Average Response Time, Average First Response Time of particular agent

response.name: Report

request.description:
| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS | | --- | --- | --- | | start(required) | string | start datetime \[YYYY-MM-DD H:i:s\] | | end(required) | string | end datetime \[YYYY-MM-DD H:i:s\] | | isBusinessHours(optional) | int | working hours filter for the report, if not provided then 0 will be considered, otherwise
1 value will considered as working hour report | You can use this endpoint to get the all tags reporting like average time to resolution, average response time, average first response time and total conversations having this tag.

item.name: Form

body.raw:
{
    "FirstName":"Rishabh",
    "LastName":"Rawat",
    "Email":"rishabh@saaslabs.co",
    "Message":"Hello, How can i help you here?",
    "OrderNo":23780565,
    "Address":"B-356, Street No-20, Kennedy town, New York",
    "Payment":"Done",
    "OrderAmount":"299$"
}

request.description:
1\. **Copy the Form Code**:

 After generating the form, you will be provided with HTML code.

 Copy the entire code to inspect it.

2\. **Locate the Action URL**:

 In the HTML code, search for the action attribute in the

tag. The URL associated with this attribute is where the form data will be sent upon submission.

 Example `form action="https://your-helpwise-action-url.com" method="POST"`

3\. **Use the Action URL in Your API Endpoint**:

 Take the action URL and use it as the endpoint for your API integration. This will allow you to programmatically submit form data to Helpwise.

body.raw:
{
    "FirstName":"Rishabh",
    "LastName":"Rawat",
    "Email":"rishabh@saaslabs.co",
    "Message":"Hello, How can i help you here?",
    "OrderNo":23780565,
    "Address":"B-356, Street No-20, Kennedy town, New York",
    "Payment":"Done",
    "OrderAmount":"299$"
}

item.description:
Custom form allows you to receive the response from your website into your Helpwise inbox in the form of email. You can create custom form [Helpwise Settings Page](https://app.helpwise.io/settings/forms)

You can set up this feature by following these steps:

1\. **Go to the Helpwise Settings Page**: In your Helpwise account, navigate to the settings page where you can manage custom forms.

2\. **Create a Custom Form**: Look for an option to create a custom form. This form can be embedded on your website, allowing users to submit inquiries, feedback, or any other information.

3\. **Set Form Forwarding**: Once the form is created, configure it to send form responses to a specific Helpwise inbox. This way, each form submission will appear as an email in your Helpwise inbox.

4\. **Embed Form on Your Website**: After setting up the form and linking it to your Helpwise inbox, embed it on your website using the code or instructions provided by Helpwise.

request.description:
You can use this endpoint, to fetch all your contacts on Helpwise

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name (optional) | string | Contacts's first name that you want to save |
| phone (optional) | string | Phone No to look for |
| email (optional) | string | Email to look for |

You can use this endpoint, to create contacts on Helpwise using your api key and api secret.

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| firstname (required) | string | Contacts's first name that you want to save |
| lastname (optional) | string | Contacts's last name that you want to save |
| emails (required) | string | Contact's emails addresses associated with your customer contacts. Pass an array of emails. |
| phones (optional) | Object | Contacts's phones no. Type define the which type of phone no you save. Pass an array of phones no. |
| companyName (optional) | string | Contacts's company name where he/she works |
| Job title (optional) | string | Contacts's job title |

You can use this endpoint, to send your SMS message to your customer on Helpwise using your api key and api secret.

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailbox_id (required) | number | inbox id of your sms inbox |
| to (required) | number | customer's number |
| message | string | body of sms |

You can use this endpoint, to send your WhatsApp message to your customer on Helpwise using your api key and api secret. Note:- If you want to use the template message then message field is optional

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailbox_id (required) | number | mailbox id of your email |
| to (required) | string | your customer number |
| message | string | message body of whatsapp |
| templateId (optional) | number | template id from template list API |
| template_variables_data (optional) | array of string | templates variable data |

You can use this endpoint, to list your Emails in a particular Conversation on Helpwise using your api key and api secret. This api returns a paginated response that you can use to go through your mailboxes.

| PARAMETER | **TYPE** | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailboxId (required) | number | id of the mailbox for which you want to fetch the conversations. |
| threadId (required) | number | id of the thread for which you want to fetch the conversations. |
| page | number | page of emails |
| limit | number |  |

body.raw:
{ "mailbox_id": 204811, "to":"rishabh@saaslabs.co,rishabh@helpwise.io", "cc":"help@helpwise.io", "subject":"Balance your workload from Helpwise", "reply_to":"ben@gmail.com", "body":"

Your Message Here!

" }

request.description:
You can use this endpoint, to send your email to your customer on Helpwise using your api key and api secret.

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailbox_id (required) | number | mailbox id of your email |
| to (required) | string | to email addresses of your customers(comma separated for multiple) |
| cc | string | cc email addresses of your customers(comma separated for multiple) |
| subject (required) | string | Subject of the email |
| email body (required) | string | Body of the email |
| reply_to | string | reply_to email address |

item.name: Note
item.description:
You can use this endpoint to add note in the conversation.

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailbox_id (required) | number | mailbox id of your inbox |
| thread_id (required) | number | conversation id of your mailbox |
| message(required) | string | body of the note |

item.name: Conversations
List (Deprecated)
item.description:
You can use this endpoint, to list your conversations on Helpwise using your api key and api secret.

| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailboxId (required) | number | id of the mailbox for which you want to fetch the conversations. |
| labelId (optional) | number | The folder from which conversations need to be fetched. Defaults to 0(inbox). |
| tabType | string | mine, mention, all, assigned, unassigned, archive, spam, trash |
| tagId (optional) | number | Provide a tagId if you want to list conversations for a particular tag. |
| squery (optional) | string | Search query to perform a text based search on emails to list the search results. |

Pagination parameters maybe provided

**^**the response data is paginated with a limit of 100 per page - know more about this in our pagination section

item.name: Assign
item.description:
| PARAMETERS | TYPE | DETAILS |
| --- | --- | --- |
| mailbox_id (required) | number | mailbox id of your inbox |
| thread_id (required) | number | conversation id of your inbox |
| assigned_to (required) | number | user id of your Helpwise account |
| assigned_to=0 | number | If you want to unassign the conversation |

You can use this endpoint, to assign the conversation to Helpwise's Users in Helpwise account using your api key and api secret.

All the conversations related endpoint is listed here where you can perform action( close, spam, trash, move to inbox, delete) on the conversation, get the conversations emails from conversation id and you can also get the inbox's conversations with pagination.
